ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" SONY Exview CCD II EFFIO-E imager, color DSP, automatic CDS sensor
Built in light sensor, 65 infrared illuminators for night vision
Lens: 4-9mm varifocal. 700TVL horizontal lines. Weather-resistant housing for indoor and outdoor use. IP66
Cable through bracket protects the camera from vandalism
Package included: 4 of Sony CCD cameras, 4 of 12V DC power supplies and 4 of Security Warning Decals
